price: A rãnar da Muke kiran* kõwane mutãne da lĩmãminsu to, wanda aka bai wa littafinsa a dã, mansa, to, waɗannan sunã karãtun littãfinsu, kuma bã a zãluntar su da zaren bãkin gurtsin dabĩno.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَدۡعُواْ كُلَّ أُنَاسِۭ بِإِمَٰمِهِمۡۖ فَمَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَقۡرَءُونَ كِتَٰبَهُمۡ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ فَتِيلٗا
footnotes: * Muƙãrana a Lãhira a tsakãnin al'ummõmi kuma da tsakãnin mũminai da kãfirai,.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma nadʿū kulla unāsin bi-imāmihim faman ūtiya kitābahu biyamīnihi fa-ulāika yaqraūna kitābahum walā yuẓ'lamūna fatīlan
translations: (even as much as) a hair on a date seed
